forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain this morning. Showers continuing this afternoon. High 4C. ENE winds shifting to W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain this morning. Showers continuing this afternoon. High 41F. ENE winds shifting to W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers this evening. Then becoming mostly cloudy overnight. Low -1C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, then cloudy overnight. Low 32F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers later in the day. High 3C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers later in the day. High near 40F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. A few flurries or snow showers possible. Low -4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. A few flurries or snow showers possible. Low 27F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Becoming partly cloudy later with any flurries or snow showers ending by noontime. High 3C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Some snow showers possible early with any snow changing to a few showers later. High 39F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 30%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low -4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 27F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. High 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers in the morning will give way to a mixture of rain and snow in the afternoon. High 38F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers before midnight. Becoming partly cloudy later. Low around -5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers before midnight. Becoming partly cloudy later. Low near 25F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 41F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low near -5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low around 25F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine in the morning with more clouds for later in the day. High 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine in the morning with more clouds for later in the day. High 38F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. Low -3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. Low 28F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. High 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. High 42F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies with late-night snow showers. Low -3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Low 29F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning changing to rain showers late. High 3C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning changing to rain showers late. High near 40F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow in the evening. Snow showers late. Low -2C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain and snow. Low 31F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers that will mix with rain showers later. High 1C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning will become rain and snow showers in the afternoon. High 37F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low -2C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low 31F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and raw. Snow showers early in the period will change to rain or freezing rain by later in the day. High 1C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snow and ice accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning changing to rain showers late. High 36F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light freezing rain. Low -2C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain and freezing rain...becoming light overnight. Low around 30F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 60%.
